channel.title: pubmed on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in pubmed on Some Title

item.title: I tried to automatically send the new coronavirus literature to LINE with Python
item.description: # Overview In this article, we will deal with the method of extracting documents related to the new coronavirus newly registered on the previous day from the medical literature database and automatically transmitting them to LINE. The main content is to extract documents that match a certain keyword from a database called PubMed. When there is a new paper, you will be notified like this. Without it it looks like this.
